data.text:
@SuperRetroid I have used my skills for a prank at the expense of a powerful pervert running for regional public office, but have never done something that anyone could interpret as real.

Imo, ethics are important in every single action. Even small actions.
@DebonaireToast Yeah. I just don't get it, either the 'Because I can' or 'Because this is the sort of thing I think COULD happen' - neither leads to good places.

@SuperRetroid I hate that people can not tell a photoshopped photo from a real one, but not nearly as much as I hate people who do the misleading fakery.

This kind of shit is the product of motivated sociopaths.
@SuperRetroid Remember the videos of what now? 😂

@JaTekken Right?

I love theorising about a good story but I don't think they're *real*.
